posts.title: Daily Note: March 2026 Prep Plan
body: **Purpose:** Research, deliverables, and sequencing for four March goals
The four goals have different timing constraints. Here is the critical path:

**The governing constraint:** Goals A and C are coupled. The UK results package proves execution credibility, which is the foundation for the ML pitch. Don't pitch ML before having UK data to anchor the conversation.
a team member engages with data that has a "so what" + next step. He ignores FYIs. The UK results package must answer three questions:
